sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  section.menu
    dl.menu__txtArea
      dt.menu__txtArea__ttl {{ttl}}
      <slot name="addAreaBefore"></slot>
      dd.menu__txtArea__txt {{txt}}
    <slot name="addAreaAfter"></slot>
</template>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
  .menu{
    width: 70%;
    max-width: 42rem;
    margin: auto;
    & + .menu{
      @include margin--top(lg);
    }
    &__img{
      background: #ddd;
      height: 250px;
      width: 100%;
      @include margin--top(md);
    }
    &__txtArea{
      @include margin--top(sm);
    }
    &__txtArea__ttl{
      @include font--size(sm);
    }
    &__txtArea__txt{
      @include margin--top(xxs);
      font-weight: normal;
    }
    &__txtArea__list{
      @extend .menu__txtArea__txt;
      margin: 1.5rem 0;
    }
  }
  // 下層はメニュー縮める、コンテンツ横にスライド＋フェード

</style>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'menu',
  props:{
    path:{type:String},
    alt:{type:String},
    class:{type:String},
    hl:{type:String},
    ttl:{type:String},
    txt:{type:String},
  }
}
</script>
